Package passport.domain.contexts.events

Class AvailableEventsListing

java.lang.Object
passport.domain.contexts.events.AvailableEventsListing
All Implemented Interfaces:
Context
public class AvailableEventsListing extends Object implements Context
Context for listing available events starting from today.
